content: let me introduse to you snowy the little sleeping baby seal this tutorial combines detailed written instructions with simple steps and step-by-step photos to craft an adorable baby seal difficulty level easy materials and tools 1 yarn recommended yarnart jeans 55% cotton / 45%pac 160m*50g 174yds*1 76oz milky #05 2 hook size 2mm us 4 3 yarn for embroidery i used acrylic thread in colors dark brown or black grey 4 needle for sewing tapestry needle scissors pins markers 5 stuffing abbreviations us terms yo yarn over magic_ring magic_ring st/sts stitch/stitches round/rnds round/rounds single_crochet single_crochet stitch increase increase 2sc in one stitch decrease decrease 2sc together invisibly chain chain stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch used for making patterns of stitches in one stitch parentheses are used for repeated patterns of stitches
